scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd dc_power_flow && python api_server.py"
scripts.dev:with-simulation: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd dc_power_flow && source venv/bin/activate &&python3 api_server.py > simulation.log 2>&1"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
